citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 12/22/15 at 2:15 PM to do a facility inspection.
* Upon arrival to the facility, licensee stated that they were leaving for a prior scheduled appointment.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 12/22/15 at 2:15 PM to do a facility inspection.
*  Upon arrival to the facility, licensee stated that they were leaving for a prior scheduled appointment.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
